mapper.update: update oms_order set status = '2' ,presale_status = '2', modify_time = now() , pay_time = now() where id = #{id} and store_id = #{storeId} and status = '1'
update oms_order set presale_status = '1', presale_price = price-presale_price, modify_time = now() where id = #{id} and store_id = #{storeId} and status = '1' and presale_status = '0'
update oms_order set price = price-#{price} , modify_price = modify_price+#{price},modify_time = now() where id = #{id} and store_id = #{storeId}
mapper.select: select freight_template_id from oms_order where id = #{id} and store_id = #{storeId}
mapper.update: update oms_order set status = '3' ,waybill_code=#{waybillCode} , logistics_company = #{companyName}, logistics_code=#{companyCode},modify_time = now() ,delivery_time = now() where id = #{id} and store_id = #{storeId} and status = '2'
update oms_order set waybill_code=#{waybillCode},logistics_company = #{companyName}, logistics_code=#{companyCode} ,modify_time = now() where id = #{id} and store_id = #{storeId} and status = '3'
mapper.insert:

order_code,
master_order_code,
customer_id,
price,
presale_price,

mapper.select: select * from oms_order where (order_code = #{orderCode} or master_order_code = #{orderCode}) and status = '1' and customer_id = #{customerId}

select * from oms_order where (order_code = #{orderCode} or master_order_code = #{orderCode})
and customer_id = #{customerId}
mapper.update: update oms_order set status = '4' , modify_time = now() , receiving_time = now() where id = #{orderId} and customer_id = #{customerId} and status = '3'
update oms_order set status = #{status} where id = #{orderId}
mapper.select: select count(1) from oms_order where customer_id = #{customer_id} and status = '1'
select count(1) from oms_order where customer_id = #{customer_id} and status = '2'
select count(1) from oms_order where customer_id = #{customer_id} and status = '3'
select count(1) from oms_order where customer_id = #{customer_id} and status = '4' and evaluation_status = '0'
select IFNULL(sum(oms_order_sku.num),0) from oms_order join oms_order_sku on oms_order.id = oms_order_sku.order_id where oms_order.status != '1' and oms_order.store_id = #{storeId}
mapper.update: update oms_order set evaluation_status = '1' , evaluation_time = now() where id = #{orderId} and customer_id = #{customerId} and evaluation_status = '0' and status ='4'
mapper.select: select * from oms_order where delivery_time < DATE_SUB(CURDATE(),INTERVAL #{day} day) and status='3' and pay_type='0'
select * from oms_order where create_time < DATE_SUB(CURDATE(),INTERVAL 1 day) and status='1' and pay_type='0'
select * from oms_order where presale_time < DATE_SUB(now(),INTERVAL 1 day) and status='1' and order_type='1'

select oms_order.*,t_store_info.store_name store_name from oms_order LEFT JOIN t_store_info on oms_order.store_id=t_store_info.id WHERE
oms_order.store_id=#{storeId}
oms_order.store_id !=0
and crowdfunding_id=#{marketingId} and oms_order.order_type in ('4','5','6')
and oms_order.order_type in ('0','1','2')
AND oms_order.status = #{status}
AND oms_order.status in ('5','6','7')
ORDER BY oms_order.create_time desc

select oms_order.*,t_store_info.store_name store_name from oms_order LEFT JOIN t_store_info on oms_order.store_id=t_store_info.id WHERE
oms_order.store_id=#{storeId}
oms_order.store_id !=0
and oms_order.order_type='3' and oms_order.status='1' order by oms_order.create_time desc
select sum(price) from oms_order where status in ('4','6','7') and DATE(receiving_time) = DATE(now()) and store_id = #{storeId}
select count(1) from oms_order where status in ('4','6','7') and DATE(receiving_time) = DATE(now()) and store_id = #{storeId}
select count(1) from oms_order where status in ('4','6','7') and YEARWEEK(date_format(receiving_time,'%Y-%m-%d')- INTERVAL 1 DAY) = YEARWEEK(now()- INTERVAL 1 DAY) and store_id = #{storeId}

select DATE(receiving_time) new_order_time,sum(price) sales_amount from oms_order where status in ('4','6','7') and YEARWEEK(date_format(receiving_time,'%Y-%m-%d')- INTERVAL 1 DAY) = YEARWEEK(now()- INTERVAL 1 DAY) and store_id = #{storeId} group by DATE(receiving_time)

select COUNT(1) from oms_order where crowdfunding_id=#{marketingId} and status in ('2','3','4','6','7')
AND store_id=#{storeId}
mapper.update: update oms_order set status = '4' ,presale_status = '2', modify_time = now() , pay_time = now(),receiving_time=now(), delivery_time=now() where id = #{id} and status = '1'
mapper.select:
select * from oms_order where crowdfunding_id=#{marketingId}
and store_id=#{storeId}
mapper.update: update oms_order set lottery_status='1' where id=#{orderId}
mapper.select: select count(1) from oms_order where DATE(pay_time) = DATE(now()) and store_id=#{storeId}
select count(1) from oms_order where store_id=#{storeId} and status = '2' AND order_type in ('0','1','2','7')
select * from oms_order where create_time < DATE_SUB(NOW(),INTERVAL 30 MINUTE) and status='1' and pay_type='0' and order_type = '8'
select * from oms_order where status = #{status} and order_type = '8' and community_buy_id = #{communityBuyId}
select id from oms_order where status != '5' and order_type = '8' and community_buy_id = #{communityBuyId}
select id, customer_id from oms_order where status = #{status} and order_type = '8' and community_buy_id =#{communityBuyId} and community_buy_customer_id = #{headCustomerId}
mapper.update: update oms_order set status = '4' , modify_time = now() , receiving_time = now() where id = #{orderId} and customer_id = #{customerId} and status = '2'
mapper.sql: select id, order_code, master_order_code, customer_id, price, presale_price, original_price, freight_price, modify_price, point_price, coupon_price, red_envelope_price, concessional_rate, status, presale_status, evaluation_status, red_envelope_code, coupon_no, use_point, pay_type, store_id, cancel_reson, predeposit_pay, source, waybill_code, order_type, create_time, pay_time, delivery_time, receiving_time, cancel_time, modify_time, evaluation_time, presale_time, group_head, group_id, group_marketing_id, group_sku_id, group_status, group_num, open_group_time, auto_handle_status, recommended, s_recommended, crowdfunding_id, lottery_status, write_off_code, community_buy_customer_id, community_buy_id, profit, community_name, community_buy_name, logistics_company, logistics_code from oms_order
mapper.select: where id = #{id}
mapper.insert:
insert into oms_order
order_code, master_order_code, customer_id, price, presale_price, original_price, freight_price, modify_price, point_price, coupon_price, red_envelope_price, concessional_rate, status, presale_status, evaluation_status, red_envelope_code, coupon_no, use_point, pay_type, store_id, cancel_reson, predeposit_pay, source, waybill_code, order_type, create_time, pay_time, delivery_time, receiving_time, cancel_time, modify_time, evaluation_time, presale_time, group_head, group_id, group_marketing_id, group_sku_id, group_status, group_num, open_group_time, auto_handle_status, recommended, s_recommended, crowdfunding_id, lottery_status, write_off_code, community_buy_customer_id, community_buy_id, profit, community_name, community_buy_name, logistics_company, logistics_code,
#{orderCode}, #{masterOrderCode}, #{customerId}, #{price}, #{presalePrice}, #{originalPrice}, #{freightPrice}, #{modifyPrice}, #{pointPrice}, #{couponPrice}, #{redEnvelopePrice}, #{concessionalRate}, #{status}, #{presaleStatus}, #{evaluationStatus}, #{redEnvelopeCode}, #{couponNo}, #{usePoint}, #{payType}, #{storeId}, #{cancelReson}, #{predepositPay}, #{source}, #{waybillCode}, #{orderType}, #{createTime}, #{payTime}, #{deliveryTime}, #{receivingTime}, #{cancelTime}, #{modifyTime}, #{evaluationTime}, #{presaleTime}, #{groupHead}, #{groupId}, #{groupMarketingId}, #{groupSkuId}, #{groupStatus}, #{groupNum}, #{openGroupTime}, #{autoHandleStatus}, #{recommended}, #{sRecommended}, #{crowdfundingId}, #{lotteryStatus}, #{writeOffCode}, #{communityBuyCustomerId}, #{communityBuyId}, #{profit}, #{communityName}, #{communityBuyName}, #{logisticsCompany}, #{logisticsCode},
mapper.delete:
delete from oms_order where id in
#{id}
